text: @GovAbbott U still acting like covid19 is no big deal? U lied to satisfy ur need to open up so u could be on Trump’s good side & so u wouldn’t have to keep paying unemployment. U don’t give a damn about the people of this state. U only care about yourself.  It’s going to get worse & worse.
